alert.note: Alert for Cass; Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 12:02PM CDT until August 02 at 12:15PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL ITASCA AND EAST CENTRAL CASS COUNTIES... At 1202 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Days High Landing, or 13 miles west of Grand Rapids, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Cohasset around 1225 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Schoolcraft State Park, Goose Lake and Siseebakwet Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
